column2: "Fufufu...it's been a long time since I last pointed a gun at you."
"I never thought that we would become enemies in this fashion..."
"You... I believed in you. Why did you betray the ARKS..?"
"No way...! That's definitely not true! This person didn't betray us at all!"
"We'd like to believe that... but killing you is unrelated."
"All of the ARKS legal information and evidence points against you... That's why we have to kill you."
"Why...? They're strange... these people. Their words, their presence...!"
"Useless, useless, impossible, impossible! That won't work. Me and Lisa... nothing you say will get to us."
"Don't you understand? It's Avis, you know. Lisa and us, we can't disobey."
"The Three Heroes gave an order to everyone. To kill you, that is."
"Well, Lisa doesn't really care about any orders... killing a person seems interesting!"
"Please, <%me>. Please don't be alarmed. I'm not an enemy."
"I will kill you to protect those little ones."
"For that reason, let me kill you."
